messages.content: ComfyUI-MiroBoard is a custom node or plugin that extends the functionality of ComfyUI, allowing users to integrate Miro boards into the ComfyUI interface for collaborative design and planning.
How does ComfyUI-MiroBoard enhance collaboration in ComfyUI?

ComfyUI-MiroBoard enhances collaboration in ComfyUI by enabling users to access and interact with Miro boards directly within the ComfyUI interface, facilitating real-time collaboration and idea sharing.
What is the main purpose of integrating Miro boards into ComfyUI?
The main purpose of integrating Miro boards into ComfyUI is to provide users with a seamless and efficient way to collaborate on design and planning tasks within the ComfyUI environment.
Can users access their existing Miro boards through ComfyUI-MiroBoard?
Yes, users can access their existing Miro boards through ComfyUI-MiroBoard, as the custom node or plugin allows for the integration of Miro boards into the ComfyUI interface.
Does ComfyUI-MiroBoard support real-time collaboration on Miro boards?
Yes, ComfyUI-MiroBoard supports real-time collaboration on Miro boards, enabling users to work together on design and planning tasks within the ComfyUI environment.
Is ComfyUI-MiroBoard a built-in feature of ComfyUI?
No, ComfyUI-MiroBoard is not a built-in feature of ComfyUI. It is a custom node or plugin that extends the functionality of ComfyUI by integrating Miro boards into the interface.
Users can install ComfyUI-MiroBoard by adding the custom node or plugin to their ComfyUI setup, following the installation instructions provided by the developer.
